description:
Discover Useful and Practical Tips How To Create and Record Online Courses.

Have a look at one of our courses on Udemy: https://www.udemy.com/micro-expressions-training-body-language-lie-detection/

In this short video we cover useful tips for beginning instructors who want to create and record their online course quickly and effectively.

You will discover the following tips:

  1. Which video recording equipment to use
  2. Tips to record videos
  3. Body Language guidelines
  4. Screen recording tips
  5. How to generate ROI with your online courses
  6. How to get the Best Content
  7. How our team can support you in creating and recording courses
title: How To Create and Record Online Courses
